alert.note: Alert for Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 17 at 1:56PM MDT until August 19 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT FRIDAY NIGHT... * Affected area: Fire Zone 105 (Flathead/Glacier Park). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds and low humidity could result in critical fire weather conditions Thursday afternoon and evening. * Timing: There will be a lull in the activity Friday morning, but then the worst conditions are expected Friday evening through late Friday night. * Winds: West winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts of 25 to 35 mph. * Minimum humidities: 10 to 15 percent. &&

area.areaDesc: Flathead National Forest, Glacier Park, Bob Marshall And Mission Mountain Wilderness
